reference.title: Radiator Freezing Prevention
reference.shortdesc: Information about anti-freezing solutions and their freezing points for radiator protection during winter.

section.title: Overview
section.p: Without an anti-freezing solution, the radiator system is at risk of freezing and damage. The risk is particularly high before circulation begins, as the water must heat up before circulation starts. Blocked or jammed radiator tubes are especially vulnerable to freezing and bursting.

section.title: Anti-Freeze Solutions
section.p: Wood or denatured alcohol can be used as effective anti-freezing agents.
